DOC.brief_summary: This is an explorative study and the scientific question to be investigated in this study is if AZD0837 and/or its metabolites AR-H069927XX and AR-H067637XX and other unknown metabolites are excreted into the bile.
DOC.criteria: body mass index (BMI) between 19 to 30 kg/m2 and body weight between 50 to 100 kg inclusive Significant illness, trauma or surgical procedures. Clinically significant laboratory abnormalities. Clinically significant medical history.
